title: Does my game, BWBvsTQD work on your coputer?
content: Ok, to see how many people cant play my game, I've started this poll, because I just discovered that it won't run on my old computer, which isnt all that old a machine. If you have my game, please vote yes or no. If it runs on one of your computers and not the other, well, just vote yes then. Thanx- .... . <> ..- -. .. ...- . .-. ... . <> .. ... <> - --- .- ... -

title: Re: Does my game, BWBvsTQD work on your coputer?
content:
It does work on one computer, but i never get a chance to use it. The computer i do use doesn't run it, but i hope to get a new video card (been saving up my money [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] )-Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: Does my game, BWBvsTQD work on your coputer?
content:
These are all the known requirements for the game:
A modern PC (Pentium or higher) running Windows 98SE, ME, 2000 or XP (or later) is required. After installation the program uses about 5 MB disk space. The program requires at least 65000 colors (high color, 16-bit). It requires at least 800x600 screen resolution. A 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 8.0 or higher and with at least 16 MB of video memory is required (preferably 32 MB or more). Also a DirectX 8.0 compatible sound card is required. Make sure all graphics and sound card drivers are up to date. DirectX 8.0 or higher is required.

(edit function unavaliable on my first post of this topic, sorry)- .... . <> ..- -. .. ...- . .-. ... . <> .. ... <> - --- .- ... -

title: bah
content:
Someone already did a "Best Keen Fangame Evar!!!11" which was .99mb to download, had a single screen of low-res background and looped a hacked and mangled version of the Hillville music. The topic for it was locked within 24 hours. :-P

Edit to be on topic: Yes, the game runs on my computer, but it was harder to find in the forums than I wanted it to be. If you're going to make a poll about your game, you should at least link to the download of your game in the post. For example:

Does MortimerInBlack's game, [url=http://planetck.spatang.com/downloads/BWBvsTQD.zip]BWB vs TQD[/url], work on your computer? Yes/No/Etc.

Also, you should Edit/Update the first post of your thread in Unofficial Keen Games to provide a download. As it is, the only download in the thread is a single-word-long link in one of Genius314's posts. That makes your game hard to find!!

title: Re: Does my game, BWBvsTQD work on your coputer?
content:
